string.value: Oh my gosh... I wound up losing #b#t1122013##k! I swear I kept it with me, but while I looked away, I wound up... misplacing it. Sigh, there's nothing I can do, I better just visit #b#p2020002##k and tell him what happened. Do I really have to go to #b#m211000100##k and face the music?

He knew I had misplaced it? He picked it up from the streets? I was shocked to hear what #b#p2020002##k told me. Honestly, losing it really made me feel guilty about it, but at least it's back in my hands now! Phew... I'll need to start another conversation with him.

I really didn't see it coming. I was totally unaware that he had left #b#m211000100##k and was watching me from the back... thankfully, #p2020002# had the item with him, and he just gave me back the item without much of a lecture. I felt so bad and embarassed that I vowed never to misplace the item ever again.
응? 무슨 문제라도 있는겐가? 얼굴 색이 좋질 않군. 고민거리가 있다면 나에게 말을 해 보게.
으음... 내가 준 마법인두를 잃어버렸다라... 허헛. 사실은 알고 있었네. 실은 내가 어딘가에 떨어져 있던 것을 주워서 갖고 있었네.
뭐? 이곳에서 계속 신발을 수리하던 것 아니냐구? 이것 보시게, 나도 사람이네. 한 곳에 그렇게 오래 앉아 있을 수만은 없지 않은가? 짬이 날 때마다 나만 알고 있는 샛길로 이곳 저곳 다니곤 하는데 마침 이걸 발견하고는 한 눈에 내가 자네에게 준 것이라고 알아 보았지.
뭐, 문제가 없다면 다행이고... 이곳의 날씨는 매우 추우니 감기에 걸리지 않도록 조심하게. 모험가에게는 건강이 제일 중요하니깐 말일세.
Hmmm? What concerns you? You don't look too well by any means. If you have something in mind, talk to me.

Oh... so you lost the Magic ?? I gave you. Hah... the truth is, I knew you did. I actually picked it up from the streets, and I had been holding on to it, hoping that you will one day come pick it up.

Even I can't stay in one place for too long. My body was aching and I need a long walk every now and then to stretch out. It was one of those long-walk days when I found the ??, and I immediately recognized it as the one I gave to you. \nTalk to me in a bit. I'll need to find it first so I can give it to you...
Well, if nothing concerns you, then that's good. It's really cold in here, and I urge you to take care of your body. Health is of utmost importance for explorers like you.
Oh I found it! It looks a bit dirtier than when I last gave it to you. Do you not take care of this? That's unfortunate. When I was using this, there was nary a scratch on this ??. Here, take it.

Promise me that you will never lose it again. I want you to take care of it as much as I did. Understood? If you run into a nother problem, then feel free to let me know. I'll try to help you as much as I can.
